identity.mission: Build ForgeVoice Studio: A production-grade, high-density dashboard for audio/video professionals.
core_principles: No Glassmorphism: Use solid, opaque layers with subtle borders.
Density is King: Maximize screen real estate. Use tight spacing (p-2, p-3) for data grids.
Studio Dark Mode: Deepest zincs/obsidians, never pure black. Indigo for focus.
Function over Flair: Every pixel must serve the production workflow.

headings.usage: Page titles, widget headers, massive metrics.

code.usage: IDs, timestamps, technical logs, code snippets.

grid_patterns.name: The Producer Dashboard
rules: Recent Activity List: col-span-12 md:col-span-6 lg:col-span-4 row-span-2

customization_rules: Backgrounds must be opaque (bg-zinc-950), NO backdrop-blur
Borders are critical for separation in dark mode

mandatory_components.name: Sidebar
mandatory_components.notes: Fixed position, scrollable nav items, user profile at bottom.

mandatory_components.name: Header
mandatory_components.notes: Breadcrumbs, Global Search (CMD+K style), Notifications, User Dropdown.

mandatory_components.name: DataTable
mandatory_components.notes: Use Shadcn Table. Dense rows. Sticky header.

universal_guidelines: Theme: STRICT DARK MODE. No light mode toggle needed for this MVP.
Interaction: All clickable elements must have a hover state (brightness-110 or bg-white/5).
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is > 4.5:1. Indigo text on dark bg might be hard, use Indigo-400 for text, Indigo-600 for bg.
Data Test IDs: ALL interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Charts: Use 'recharts' via Shadcn chart components.
instructions_to_main_agent: STEP 1: Install dependencies: lucide-react, recharts, sonner, clsx, tailwind-merge.
STEP 2: Configure Tailwind with the 'Studio Obsidian' palette in index.css.
STEP 3: Build the Layout Shell (Sidebar + Header + Main Content Area).
STEP 4: Implement Routing for all 13 placeholder pages.
STEP 5: Create the 'Dashboard Overview' with dummy charts and stats using the grid strategy.
STEP 6: Ensure Login/Signup pages are implemented with the same aesthetic.
NOTE: Do not ask user for clarifications. Make executive decisions based on the 'Studio' persona.
